attributes.action: Make ST GEORGE'S DAY A  BANK HOLIDAY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As we are aware ST George's Day is not a public bank holiday if the Irish have St Patricks Day the Welsh have St Davids day why can not we have ST GEORGE'S DAY.

PLEASE SIGN AND LETS GET THIS RECOGNISED AS A PUBLIC BANK HOLIDAY FOR THE ENGLISH!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
